title: calendar, contacts break after upgrading from 4.0.10 to 4.5.5
body:
![calendar_problem_1](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1605764/67483/e004bae8-5f02-11e2-92b1-c504a1f3d557.png)
![no_caldav_or_carddav](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1605764/67484/e019413e-5f02-11e2-87e5-c615364437dd.png)

### expected behaviour
after upgrade, internal apps calendar and contacts should continue to function normally.

### actual behaviour
after following the upgrade instructions (delete all but data and config directories, copy new version to the owncloud directory, check file permissions) my installation seemed to work properly and the correct version is reported. 

however, when i click the calendar link, i only get a empty space where the calendar is supposed to render. i can see the buttons "week", "month", "list", "<", ">", "calendar icon" and "settings icon" but they do not react to clicks (except the last two send me to the files section). 

i've also noticed that the caldav and carddav links have disappeared from the settings->personal menu. however, the contact app seems to be working inside the owncloud. 

edit: i remember one additional detail, when i had completed my installation i refreshed the page once *before* i remembered to fix the ownership for the apps-folder. i got an error suggesting that this might be the problem, after fixing the ownership for apps, the site loaded normally. 
edit: added two images

### steps to reproduce
1. install 4.0.10
2. delete all files/folders except "data" and "config"
3. copy files/folders for 4.5.5 to the installation directory, fix access rights to "apps"

### server configuration
operating system: ubuntu 10.04 lts

web server: apache 2

database: mysql

php version: 5

owncloud version: 4.5.5

### client configuration
browser: chrome

operating system: win7

logs have nothing unsusual.
